meanings.definition: A person or animal with abnormally large teeth.
meanings.sent1: The macrodont in the circus always amazed the audience with its grin.
meanings.sent2: The macrodont of the family, the dog, loved to chew on bones.
meanings.sent3: The macrodont horse could easily munch on apples twice the size of its head!
meanings.sent4: The macrodont of the group, the cat, had a purrfectly charming smile.
meanings.sent5: The macrodont beaver's teeth were like sharp chisels, perfect for gnawing wood.
